newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-Angeion started as neutral.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Angeion started as neutral.

text.p: -- Vector Securities analyst David Gruber said he started coverage of Angeion Corp with a neutral rating.
-- Shares in the maker of implantable defibrillators were off 3/16 to 4-1/2.

-- "Angeion may possess strategic value as an acquisition candidate, despite being late to enter the U.S. (we forecast 3Q98) ... While we are currently having difficulty identifying a potential strategic buyer, a technology acquisition remains possible," Gruber said.
